subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: DeAndre Yedlin, a young defender who was a breakout star of the World Cup for the United States, is hoping this year at Tottenham Hotspur will be transformative.
snippet: DeAndre Yedlin, a young defender who was a breakout star of the World Cup for the United States, is hoping this year at Tottenham Hotspur will be transformative.
